src.utils.general
=================

.. py:module:: src.utils.general

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   General utilities for the KAN Imagery Catalog plugin.

----------

   src.utils.general.PLUGIN_NAME

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: _get_plugin_name(missing='KAN Imagery Catalog')

   Get plugin name from metadata.txt file.


.. py:function:: get_plugin_dir()

   Get plugin directory.
